detailed_results.question: Without linking to residence, what is the basis of taxation for corporations?

detailed_results.question: What changes have been made to the corporate tax incentives for green industries in Bangladesh?
detailed_results.ground_truth: Corporate tax incentives for green industries in Bangladesh:  The corporate tax holiday for agro based industries has been extended to ten years for industries engaged in.  Processing locally grown fruits and vegetables, producing milk and dairy products, Producing baby food entirely from locally grown agricultural products
detailed_results.prediction:
Based on the provided context, here are the changes made to the corporate tax incentives for green industries in Bangladesh:

• Corporate tax holiday for IT hardware producers has been introduced (Section 78 of the Income Tax Ordinance).
• Corporate tax holiday for agro-based industries has been extended (Section 78 of the Income Tax Ordinance).
• A new corporate tax holiday has been introduced for producer of light engineering products (Section 78 of the Income Tax Ordinance).

These changes are subject to certain conditions, including:

• Registered with BIDA (Bangladesh Investment Development Authority)
• At least 30 percent value addition in own factory
• Commencement of commercial production within a specific timeframe (e.g., June 2030 for IT hardware producers)

Note that the government may notify other categories of industries eligible for tax holiday incentives through an official Gazette notification.
